# The singularity of 3D printing {-}

## Why is 3D printing compelling for (some) scientists {-}

### Digitalised design **computer** {-}

* Repetition
* Accuracy
* Sharing/adapting

### Accessibility {-}

* Cost
* Simple software
* Simple hardware

### Translation {-}

* Outreach
* Citizen science
* ...
